question:
Buying things on the internet such as books,air tickets and groceries is becoming more and more popular.
Do the advantages of shopping in this way outweigh the disadvantages?
text: The internet is becoming a very essential part of our lives now a days.We can buy necessary materials, books, tickets and can do many things in a minute of time.With the pros of the buying things online there are also some cons of the technology, but the advantages of it outweigh the disadvantages.

There are many advantages of using internet for different purposes.First of all, shopping through internet saves our time.For example, if you a buy a grocery from the shop there is a chance of congestion and price different while through internet you can buy it more conveniently.Secondly online shopping provides us with a range of variety.For instance, if you buy a book from the shop then shopkeeper provides a book of the publisher for which they got the dealership.You will unable to find a book which suits you.At last but not the least shopping online provides us an additional discount like air tickets have discounts many times at festivals.

Everything has its own negative sides and internet shopping has also some.First of all there are chances of bad quality of material provided to us.Sometime people have the issue with the mismatching of the order.Also, some fraud and hackers can harm us with their own website links which we cannot able to recognise and they can also hack our online internet banking password.
To conclude, there are many benefits of shopping through internet, and booking online tickets.From above discussed reasons we can say that the pros of the online shopping outweigh its cons.
